items.value: An attack group sent by %14@ has arrived at %04@ and is preparing to launch their assault!
We sent %118@ to assist the defenders. Even with our aid, the attackers headed by %123@ proved to be too tough. The entire defense group was wiped out.
%118@ joined in the defense ( %124@ ) of %04@ from an attack led by %123@. The defense lost and have been wiped out.
%04@ has been stripped away from %01@.
We sent %118@ to assist the attackers but they encountered no resistance. %04@ fell rather quickly.
%118@ joined %123@ in assaulting %04@. They encountered no resistance.
%04@ has been stripped away from %01@.
We sent %118@ to assist the attackers. Even with our aid, the defenders headed by %123@ proved to be too tough. The entire assault group was wiped out.
%118@ joined %123@ in assaulting %04@'s defenses ( %124@ ). They lost and have been wiped out.
%118@ joined %123@ in assaulting %04@'s defenses ( %124@ ). They won and wiped out an entire defense group.
We sent %118@ to assist the attackers. With our aid, they successfully defeated a group of defenders headed by %123@. They have all been wiped out.
%04@ has been stripped away from %01@.
We sent %118@ to assist the defenders. With our aid, they managed to fend off the assault led by %123@. The entire assault group was wiped out.
%118@ joined in the defense ( %124@ ) of %04@ from an attack led by %123@. The attackers lost and have been wiped out.

We sent %118@ and %121b army to defend the defenseless %04@. %119a valiantly defended the area against the assault led by %123@. Unfortunately, %121b efforts were not enough and %121b entire group was wiped out by the attackers.
%118@ singlehandedly defended %04@ from an attack led by %123@. %121a group lost and have been wiped out.
%04@ has been stripped away from %01@.

We sent %118@ and %121b army to defend the defenseless %04@. %119a valiantly defended the area against the assault led by %123@. %121a group managed to fend off the assault and wipe out all of the attackers.
%118@ singlehandedly defended %04@ from an attack led by %123@. %121a group won and wiped out the attackers.
We decided to stand back and watch the ensuing battle. The attack was led by %123@. The defense was led by %124@. The attackers won and wiped out all the defenders.
%123@ assaulted %04@'s defenses ( %124@ ). They won and wiped out an entire defense group.
%04@ has been stripped away from %01@.
We decided to stand back and watch the ensuing battle. The attack was led by %123@. The defense was led by %124@. The defenders won and wiped out all the attackers.
%123@ assaulted %04@'s defenses ( %124@ ). They lost and were wiped out.
We decided to stand back and watch the ensuing battle. The attack was led by %123@. %04@ was completely defenseless and fell rather quickly.
%123@ assaulted %04@. They encountered no resistance.
%04@ has been stripped away from %01@.
